Title: An Unforgettable Summer
Actors: Kristin Scott Thomas, Claudiu Bleont, Olga Tudorache, George Constantin
Plot: Romania in the 1920's. Marie-Thérèse Von Debretsy refuses the advances of her husband's commanding officer. As a result, the cosmopolitan family is reassigned to a dark and dangerous outpost on the frontier between Bulgaria and Romania where their relationship and humanity are severely tested.
